titleStmt.title: A postill or collection of moste godly doctrine vpon every gospell through the yeare aswell for holye dayes as Sondayes, dygested in suche order, as they bee appoynted and set forthe in the booke of Common Prayer. Uery profitable for all curates, parentes, maysters of housholdes, and other gouerners of youth.
Postilla Anthonii Corvini
titleStmt.author: Corvinus, Antonius, 1501-1553.

titleStmt.title: A postill or collection of moste godly doctrine vpon every gospell through the yeare aswell for holye dayes as Sondayes, dygested in suche order, as they bee appoynted and set forthe in the booke of Common Prayer. Uery profitable for all curates, parentes, maysters of housholdes, and other gouerners of youth.
Postilla Anthonii Corvini
titleStmt.author: Corvinus, Antonius, 1501-1553.

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Postilla Anthonii Corvini in epistolas et evangelia cum de tempore tum de sanctis totius anni.
At foot of title page: Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum.
Signatures: [hand]⁴ A-b⁴ c-x y⁶, A-Q (Q7-8 blank).
Identified as STC 20131 on UMI microfilm reel 1580.
Inner forme of first quire reimposed; second leaf is signed.--STC.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library and the Cambridge University Library.
Appears at reel 33 #1 (British Library copy), and at reel 1580 ʻ (Cambridge University Library copy).
